name: Coral Sands Beach
description: White sand, clear waters and a serene environment perfect for snorkeling and sunset walks.

name: Sunset Cove Beach
description: A lively beach with local vendors, paddle boarding and a vibrant evening market nearby.

name: Bondi Beach
description: World-famous beach known for surfing, golden sand, and vibrant seaside cafes.

name: Golden Temple
description: Historic temple known for its golden architecture and community kitchen.

name: Ancient Hill Temple
description: A quiet, centuries-old temple nestled on a forested hill. Great for meditation and nature walks.

name: Angkor Wat
description: One of the largest religious monuments in the world, known for its ancient Khmer architecture.

name: Mount Fuji
description: Japan’s tallest peak, an iconic snow-capped mountain popular with climbers and photographers.

name: Swiss Alps
description: Famous for skiing, hiking, and breathtaking alpine scenery.

name: Rocky Mountains
description: A vast mountain range offering national parks, wildlife, and outdoor adventure.

name: Karachi Highlights
description: Vibrant port city with markets, historical sites and seaside promenades.

name: Lisbon Coastal
description: Picturesque coastal city with cliffs, historic neighborhoods and fresh seafood.

name: Santorini Escape
description: Beautiful island city with whitewashed houses, blue-domed churches, and stunning sunsets.

name: New York City
description: The city that never sleeps, home to Times Square, Central Park, and Broadway shows.

name: Amazon Rainforest
description: The largest rainforest in the world, full of wildlife and adventure opportunities.

name: Sahara Desert Trek
description: Camel rides, golden dunes, and starry desert nights in the world’s largest hot desert.
